survey_properties.intro_message:
Here are 20 questions in total.

Please answer with your true feeling at the moment.

Take a break anytime if you need :)

questions.question_title: 1. I am unhappy doing so many things alone
choices: O - I often feel this way
S - I sometimes feel this way
